mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text != text[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text == text[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w]', 'MUTATED', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text == text[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text == text[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text == text[::-2]

import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text == text[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text == text[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(text):
    text = re.sub('[^\\w]', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    return text == text[::--1]
